activationError: Error during the activation procedure. The action may have been performed previously, or the link is not valid due to expiration. Please try requesting the action again.
activationSuccessEmail: The new email address has been successfully saved for your profile as your primary email address.
activationSuccessUser: Your user account has been successfully activated. You can sign in to the site using the username and password you entered during registration.
passwordChange: Please fill out the form below to set a new password for your account.
passwordChangeSuccess: The password change procedure has been successfully completed. You can log in to the site using your username and new password.
